That's the kind of trick it is.\""},{"lineNumber":25076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやいや。大軍を使った野戦で……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, no. In a field battle with a large army..."},{ "lineNumber":25077,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しかも攻めて、守って、伏兵を仕込んで。","translatedEnglishLine":"Moreover, attacking, defending, and laying ambushes."},{"lineNumber":25078,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦術の教科書に載せたいくらいでしたぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It was something worthy of being in a tactics textbook.\""},{"lineNumber":25079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お主もよくやってくれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You did well too."},{"lineNumber":25080,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カーソンを固めてくれたおかげで楽ができたわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to you securing Carson, things went easier.\""},{"lineNumber":25081,"originalJapaneseLine":"「持ち場を固めるくらいしか能がありませんからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Holding my position is about the only thing I'm capable of."},{"lineNumber":25082,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そう言って頂けると光栄です」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's an honor to be told that.\""},{"lineNumber":25083,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、青の軍の護衛はちょっと暑苦しいのよね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But the Blue Army’s escort is a bit stifling."},{"lineNumber":25084,"originalJapaneseLine":"　親衛隊がいないから、仕方ないけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"Though I guess it can't be helped since there's no royal guard.\""},{"lineNumber":25085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わぁっはっは！　すみませんな、リア様！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wahaha! Sorry about that, Lady Ria!"},{"lineNumber":25086,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ですが部下どもは喜んでおりましたぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"But the subordinates were quite pleased.\""},{"lineNumber":25087,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、リア様。今日は前に出すぎです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, Lady Ria, you went too far forward today."},{"lineNumber":25088,"originalJapaneseLine":"　影武者を置いて、居場所を特定されないように","translatedEnglishLine":"We placed a body double so your location wouldn't be exposed,"},{"lineNumber":25089,"originalJapaneseLine":"　してはいましたが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but still...\""},{"lineNumber":25090,"originalJapaneseLine":"「士気が重要な局面でしょ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Morale is crucial at this point."},{"lineNumber":25091,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのくらいのリスクは構わないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That level of risk is acceptable.\""},{"lineNumber":25092,"originalJapaneseLine":"やや苦い声色のマリスに、","translatedEnglishLine":"To Maris's somewhat bitter tone,"},{"lineNumber":25093,"originalJapaneseLine":"リアは気にせずそう返した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria responded without concern."},{"lineNumber":25094,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに……せっかくダーリンが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Besides... darling went through all that trouble,"},{"lineNumber":25095,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人を片付けてくれたんだもん。","translatedEnglishLine":"to take care of the demon lord."},{"lineNumber":25096,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最後の仕上げは、妻の務めよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"The final touch is my duty as his wife.\""},{"lineNumber":25097,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……仕方ありませんね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I suppose it can't be helped.\""},{"lineNumber":25098,"originalJapaneseLine":"少しだけ頬を緩めて、マリスは引き下がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Maris softened her expression slightly and stepped back."},{"lineNumber":25099,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、バレス？　まだ終わりじゃないんでしょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, Bares? It's not over yet, right?\""},{"lineNumber":25100,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は……むしろ本番はここから、ですな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes... in fact, the real battle starts now."},{"lineNumber":25101,"originalJapaneseLine":"　数の上でもようやく互角といったところ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Numerically, we're finally at parity."},{"lineNumber":25102,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦い方ひとつで、どう転ぶか……","translatedEnglishLine":"How it turns out depends entirely on the tactics...\""},{"lineNumber":25103,"originalJapaneseLine":"と、バレスの言葉を遮るようにして、","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, interrupting Bares' words,"},{"lineNumber":25104,"originalJapaneseLine":"控えめにノックの音が響いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"a soft knock echoed."},{"lineNumber":25105,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お父様、私が」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Father, I will—\""},{"lineNumber":25106,"originalJapaneseLine":"スーが扉へ向かって応対し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Su moved to the door to respond,"},{"lineNumber":25107,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵士から一封の手紙を受け取ってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and received a letter from a soldier."},{"lineNumber":25108,"originalJapaneseLine":"戻ってきて、その手紙をそのまま義父に手渡す。","translatedEnglishLine":"He returned and handed the letter directly to his father-in-law."},{"lineNumber":25109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂にか。…………ふむ、白の軍……エクスか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For me, huh... hmm, the White Army... Ex.\""},{"lineNumber":25110,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...........................\""},{"lineNumber":25111,"originalJapaneseLine":"目でリアに許可を取り、手紙を開けて中身を確認し。","translatedEnglishLine":"He asked Ria silently for permission, then opened and read the letter."},{"lineNumber":25112,"originalJapaneseLine":"黒の老将は、わずかに片眉を持ち上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The old Black General slightly raised an eyebrow."},{"lineNumber":25113,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍、リーザス方面軍司令部――","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Army, Leesas Front Army Headquarters—"},{"lineNumber":25114,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間めが…………小賢しい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Humans... so cunning."},{"lineNumber":25115,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂らを、嵌めてくれたというわけか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You've managed to trick us...\""},{"lineNumber":25116,"originalJapaneseLine":"苦々しく、ヨシフは呼気を吐きだした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Joseph bitterly exhaled."},{"lineNumber":25117,"originalJapaneseLine":"周囲に居並ぶ魔物将軍達は、","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon generals standing around him,"},{"lineNumber":25118,"originalJapaneseLine":"直立不動の構えで立っている。","translatedEnglishLine":"stood rigidly at attention."},{"lineNumber":25119,"originalJapaneseLine":"絶対的な主であるヨシフが来た時点で、","translatedEnglishLine":"At the arrival of their absolute lord Joseph,"},{"lineNumber":25120,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍達は自ら判断する事を放棄した、","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon generals abandoned independent judgement,"},{"lineNumber":25121,"originalJapaneseLine":"思考する奴隷と化している。","translatedEnglishLine":"becoming mindless slaves."},{"lineNumber":25122,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さぁて……どうしたものか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then... what should we do?"},{"lineNumber":25123,"originalJapaneseLine":"　未だ、叩き潰す事も不可能ではないが……","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s not yet impossible to crush them..."},{"lineNumber":25124,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おい、考えを述べてみろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, tell me your thoughts.\""},{"lineNumber":25125,"originalJapaneseLine":"気まぐれを起こした風に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Feigning whimsy,"},{"lineNumber":25126,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヨシフは傍らの一人に声を掛けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Joseph called out to one at his side."},{"lineNumber":25127,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、ははっ。包囲され、他の部隊は遠く……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha, haha. We are surrounded, other units are far away..."},{"lineNumber":25128,"originalJapaneseLine":"　糧秣にまで被害が及んでおります。","translatedEnglishLine":"Even our provisions have been affected."},{"lineNumber":25129,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここは、撤退かと…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"I think we should retreat here...\""},{"lineNumber":25130,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………撤退か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Retreat?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段は少数の兵の方々に物音だけ立ててもらって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Usually, only a small number of soldiers make noise,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大勢潜んでるように見せかけて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to make it seem like there's a large number hidden...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「スーと兵士たちが頃合いを見てそちらに回り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Su and the soldiers cautiously move over there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見せかけ通りの働きを一瞬して、同じような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: briefly perform as if the ruse is real, then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別の場所に、また移る。そういう小細工ですな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they move again to a similar spot. That's the kind of trick it is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやいや。大軍を使った野戦で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, no. In a field battle with a large army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかも攻めて、守って、伏兵を仕込んで。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, attacking, defending, and laying ambushes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦術の教科書に載せたいくらいでしたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was something worthy of being in a tactics textbook."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お主もよくやってくれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You did well too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カーソンを固めてくれたおかげで楽ができたわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to you securing Carson, things went easier."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「持ち場を固めるくらいしか能がありませんからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Holding my position is about the only thing I'm capable of.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう言って頂けると光栄です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's an honor to be told that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、青の軍の護衛はちょっと暑苦しいのよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But the Blue Army’s escort is a bit stifling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親衛隊がいないから、仕方ないけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though I guess it can't be helped since there's no royal guard."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わぁっはっは！　すみませんな、リア様！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wahaha! Sorry about that, Lady Ria!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが部下どもは喜んでおりましたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the subordinates were quite pleased."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、リア様。今日は前に出すぎです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, Lady Ria, you went too far forward today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 影武者を置いて、居場所を特定されないように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We placed a body double so your location wouldn't be exposed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: してはいましたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but still..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「士気が重要な局面でしょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Morale is crucial at this point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのくらいのリスクは構わないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That level of risk is acceptable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やや苦い声色のマリスに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To Maris's somewhat bitter tone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアは気にせずそう返した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria responded without concern.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに……せっかくダーリンが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides... darling went through all that trouble,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を片付けてくれたんだもん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to take care of the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後の仕上げは、妻の務めよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The final touch is my duty as his wife."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……仕方ありませんね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I suppose it can't be helped."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しだけ頬を緩めて、マリスは引き下がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maris softened her expression slightly and stepped back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、バレス？　まだ終わりじゃないんでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, Bares? It's not over yet, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は……むしろ本番はここから、ですな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... in fact, the real battle starts now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数の上でもようやく互角といったところ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Numerically, we're finally at parity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦い方ひとつで、どう転ぶか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How it turns out depends entirely on the tactics..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、バレスの言葉を遮るようにして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, interrupting Bares' words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控えめにノックの音が響いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a soft knock echoed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お父様、私が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Father, I will—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スーが扉へ向かって応対し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Su moved to the door to respond,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士から一封の手紙を受け取ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and received a letter from a soldier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戻ってきて、その手紙をそのまま義父に手渡す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He returned and handed the letter directly to his father-in-law.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂にか。…………ふむ、白の軍……エクスか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For me, huh... hmm, the White Army... Ex."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目でリアに許可を取り、手紙を開けて中身を確認し。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He asked Ria silently for permission, then opened and read the letter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒の老将は、わずかに片眉を持ち上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The old Black General slightly raised an eyebrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍、リーザス方面軍司令部――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army, Leesas Front Army Headquarters—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間めが…………小賢しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Humans... so cunning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂らを、嵌めてくれたというわけか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've managed to trick us..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦々しく、ヨシフは呼気を吐きだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Joseph bitterly exhaled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲に居並ぶ魔物将軍達は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon generals standing around him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直立不動の構えで立っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stood rigidly at attention.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対的な主であるヨシフが来た時点で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the arrival of their absolute lord Joseph,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍達は自ら判断する事を放棄した、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon generals abandoned independent judgement,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思考する奴隷と化している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: becoming mindless slaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さぁて……どうしたものか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... what should we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 未だ、叩き潰す事も不可能ではないが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s not yet impossible to crush them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、考えを述べてみろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, tell me your thoughts."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気まぐれを起こした風に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feigning whimsy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフは傍らの一人に声を掛けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Joseph called out to one at his side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははっ。包囲され、他の部隊は遠く……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha, haha. We are surrounded, other units are far away...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 糧秣にまで被害が及んでおります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even our provisions have been affected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは、撤退かと…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think we should retreat here..."
"...Retreat?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

side."},{"lineNumber":25127,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、ははっ。包囲され、他の部隊は遠く……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha, haha. We are surrounded, other units are far away..."},{"lineNumber":25128,"originalJapaneseLine":"　糧秣にまで被害が及んでおります。","translatedEnglishLine":"Even our provisions have been affected."},{"lineNumber":25129,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここは、撤退かと…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"I think we should retreat here...\""},{"lineNumber":25130,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………撤退か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Retreat?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段は少数の兵の方々に物音だけ立ててもらって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Usually, only a small number of soldiers make noise,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大勢潜んでるように見せかけて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to make it seem like there's a large number hidden...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「スーと兵士たちが頃合いを見てそちらに回り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Su and the soldiers cautiously move over there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見せかけ通りの働きを一瞬して、同じような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: briefly perform as if the ruse is real, then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別の場所に、また移る。そういう小細工ですな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they move again to a similar spot. That's the kind of trick it is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやいや。大軍を使った野戦で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, no. In a field battle with a large army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかも攻めて、守って、伏兵を仕込んで。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, attacking, defending, and laying ambushes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦術の教科書に載せたいくらいでしたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was something worthy of being in a tactics textbook."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お主もよくやってくれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You did well too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カーソンを固めてくれたおかげで楽ができたわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to you securing Carson, things went easier."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「持ち場を固めるくらいしか能がありませんからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Holding my position is about the only thing I'm capable of.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう言って頂けると光栄です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's an honor to be told that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、青の軍の護衛はちょっと暑苦しいのよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But the Blue Army’s escort is a bit stifling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親衛隊がいないから、仕方ないけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though I guess it can't be helped since there's no royal guard."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わぁっはっは！　すみませんな、リア様！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wahaha! Sorry about that, Lady Ria!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが部下どもは喜んでおりましたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the subordinates were quite pleased."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、リア様。今日は前に出すぎです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, Lady Ria, you went too far forward today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 影武者を置いて、居場所を特定されないように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We placed a body double so your location wouldn't be exposed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: してはいましたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but still..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「士気が重要な局面でしょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Morale is crucial at this point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのくらいのリスクは構わないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That level of risk is acceptable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やや苦い声色のマリスに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To Maris's somewhat bitter tone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアは気にせずそう返した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria responded without concern.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに……せっかくダーリンが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides... darling went through all that trouble,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を片付けてくれたんだもん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to take care of the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後の仕上げは、妻の務めよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The final touch is my duty as his wife."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……仕方ありませんね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I suppose it can't be helped."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しだけ頬を緩めて、マリスは引き下がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maris softened her expression slightly and stepped back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、バレス？　まだ終わりじゃないんでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, Bares? It's not over yet, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は……むしろ本番はここから、ですな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... in fact, the real battle starts now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数の上でもようやく互角といったところ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Numerically, we're finally at parity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦い方ひとつで、どう転ぶか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How it turns out depends entirely on the tactics..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、バレスの言葉を遮るようにして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, interrupting Bares' words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控えめにノックの音が響いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a soft knock echoed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お父様、私が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Father, I will—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スーが扉へ向かって応対し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Su moved to the door to respond,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士から一封の手紙を受け取ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and received a letter from a soldier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戻ってきて、その手紙をそのまま義父に手渡す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He returned and handed the letter directly to his father-in-law.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂にか。…………ふむ、白の軍……エクスか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For me, huh... hmm, the White Army... Ex."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目でリアに許可を取り、手紙を開けて中身を確認し。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He asked Ria silently for permission, then opened and read the letter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒の老将は、わずかに片眉を持ち上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The old Black General slightly raised an eyebrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍、リーザス方面軍司令部――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army, Leesas Front Army Headquarters—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間めが…………小賢しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Humans... so cunning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂らを、嵌めてくれたというわけか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've managed to trick us..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦々しく、ヨシフは呼気を吐きだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Joseph bitterly exhaled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲に居並ぶ魔物将軍達は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon generals standing around him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直立不動の構えで立っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stood rigidly at attention.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対的な主であるヨシフが来た時点で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the arrival of their absolute lord Joseph,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍達は自ら判断する事を放棄した、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon generals abandoned independent judgement,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思考する奴隷と化している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: becoming mindless slaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さぁて……どうしたものか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... what should we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 未だ、叩き潰す事も不可能ではないが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s not yet impossible to crush them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、考えを述べてみろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, tell me your thoughts."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気まぐれを起こした風に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feigning whimsy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフは傍らの一人に声を掛けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Joseph called out to one at his side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははっ。包囲され、他の部隊は遠く……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha, haha. We are surrounded, other units are far away...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 糧秣にまで被害が及んでおります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even our provisions have been affected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは、撤退かと…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think we should retreat here..."
"...Retreat?"
